<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Advanced First Aid](/Feats.aspx?ID=2107) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 202 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Master in [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9)

</column>

---

You use your medical training to ameliorate sickness or assuage fears. When you use [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) to [Administer First Aid](/Actions.aspx?ID=54), instead of Stabilizing a character or Stopping Bleeding, you can reduce an ally's [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) or [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) condition by 2, or remove either of those conditions entirely on a critical success. You can remove only one condition at a time. The DC for the Medicine check is usually the DC of the effect that caused the condition.
name: Advanced First Aid
